skill.name: tests-maintenance
skill.description: Maintains IdeaVim test suite quality. Reviews disabled tests, ensures Neovim annotations are documented, and improves test readability. Use for periodic test maintenance.
skill.summary: Maintains IdeaVim test suite quality. Reviews disabled tests, ensures Neovim annotations are documen...
skill.author: JetBrains

security_audit.summary: No data theft, exfiltration, or malicious execution patterns were found. The content is procedural guidance for maintaining tests. It matches the stated purpose.

content.value_statement: Test suites drift and lose clarity over time. This skill guides focused maintenance to restore readability and proper documentation.
actual_capabilities: Identify disabled tests using @Disabled and outline re-enable steps
Audit @TestWithoutNeovim usage and enforce documented reasons
Flag meaningless test strings and suggest realistic replacements
Review @VimBehaviorDiffers annotations for validity and tracking
Provide commands to run targeted Gradle tests
limitations: Does not fix production code bugs or implement features
Requires IdeaVim test sources to perform checks
Does not execute tests without user action
Focuses on small test subsets per run

use_cases.title: Quarterly test audit
use_cases.description: Review disabled tests and improve annotations before a release.

use_cases.title: Improve test clarity
use_cases.description: Replace meaningless strings with realistic content in new tests.

use_cases.title: Neovim parity checks
use_cases.description: Validate and document Neovim exclusion reasons.

prompt_templates.title: Quick audit plan
prompt_templates.prompt: Pick one test file and list the key quality checks I should perform.

prompt_templates.title: Disabled test review
prompt_templates.prompt: Scan for @Disabled tests and propose which could be re-enabled with rationale.

prompt_templates.title: Neovim exclusions check
prompt_templates.prompt: Find @TestWithoutNeovim cases lacking descriptions and suggest fixes.

prompt_templates.title: Deep maintenance pass
prompt_templates.prompt: Review one test file for readability, @Disabled, @TestWithoutNeovim, and @VimBehaviorDiffers issues, then propose edits.

output_examples.input: Review ScrollTest for Neovim exclusions and clarity issues.
output: Found 2 @TestWithoutNeovim annotations missing descriptions; add reasons for viewport differences.
Replace placeholder text with a realistic scrolling example.

best_practices: Work on a single test file per run to keep changes focused
Document every Neovim exclusion with a clear reason
Use realistic test content that reflects actual usage
anti_patterns: Changing production code while doing test maintenance
Using meaningless strings like asdf or qwerty in tests

faq.question: What projects are compatible?
faq.answer: This skill targets IdeaVim test suites and Kotlin-based tests.

faq.question: What are the main limits?
faq.answer: It does not fix bugs or add features and needs access to tests.

faq.question: Can it integrate with CI?
faq.answer: It provides Gradle commands that you can run in your CI setup.

faq.question: Is my data safe?
faq.answer: The skill does not access credentials or send data over the network.

faq.question: What if a test still fails?
faq.answer: Keep it disabled and document the reason or open an issue.

faq.question: How does it compare to a linter?
faq.answer: It focuses on test intent and documentation, not code style rules.
